articles.title: Zoom has another security update on the way to cut down on Zoombombing - BetaNews
articles.description: It seems like it's been a little while since we heard much about Zoom, but we're still in the company's self-imposed 90-day security clean-up operation.
articles.content:
It seems like it's been a little while since we heard much about Zoom, but we're still in the company's self-imposed 90-day security clean-up operation.

articles.description: Last month, Apple introduced a Mac Pro Wheels Kit designed for the Mac Pro that adds wheels to the machine after purchase. The kit is priced at...
articles.content:
Last month, Apple introduced a Mac Pro Wheels Kit designed for the Mac Pro that adds wheels to the machine after purchase. The kit is priced at $699.

articles.title: Take a first look at ‘Crucible’, Amazon’s free sci-fi shooter - NME
articles.description: After over four years of development, Amazon's multiplayer sci-fi shooter, Crucible, will release this month, as announced through a new trailer
articles.content:
Amazons sci-fi shooter, Crucible, will finally release this May after years of development. Amazon took to YouTube to release a new First Look trailer that revealed the games launch date, as well as more details about the game itself.
Per the trailer, Crucib… [+1442 chars]

articles.title: Animal Crossing's Fake Art Does Some Creepy Things - GameSpot
articles.description: Redd is back selling forged artwork in New Horizons, and it looks like some of the pieces might be just a little haunted.
articles.content: Animal Crossing: New Horizons' latest update brought back two returning characters: the shrub-selling Leif and shady art vendor Redd. The latter operates a small merchant ship called Jolly Redd's Treasure Trawler, which is the only place you can purchase artw… [+1689 chars]

articles.title: Everything we know about Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Setting, gameplay, and release date - Android Central
articles.description: Ubisoft has unveiled Assassin's Creed Valhalla. Check out everything we know so far from its gameplay, story, release date, and more.
articles.content:
Source: Ubisoft
